abstract: Brian Morgan, co-founder and commissioner of Texas Youth Football League, defends practice of letting young boys play dangerous and violent game after several of the association's teams were featured on reality show Friday Night Tykes, prompting criticism of youth leagues; despite controversy, popular show has actually boosted enrollment in TYFL.
lead_paragraph: The Texas Youth Football Association fueled a debate about youth football and parenting after it was featured on “Friday Night Tykes,” which has returned with some intensity toned down.
snippet: The Texas Youth Football Association fueled a debate about youth football and parenting after it was featured on “Friday Night Tykes,” which has returned with some intensity toned down.

headline.main: Knocked for Risks, League Plays Defense
headline.seo: ‘Friday Night Tykes’ Returns With Virtues Played Up
headline.print_headline: Knocked for Risks, League Plays Defense
